name: S U R Limited Edition 7"
description:
BBR#6 - SUR

Here is the last release of 2013 on BBR and its a rocker!

4 tracks of dark Texan acid soaked psych grooves to blow away the cobwebs in a limited sleeve with a mock Polaroid on the back; all 125 copies have a different polaroid attached. No 2 sleeves are the same!

Tracklist -
1. FOX M (Re-recorded longer version).
2. KINGS DISEASE.
3. SOUTHERN BOY.
4. SHUT UP!

Each 7" contains - 
Numbered copper brown print sleeve with mock polaroid attached.
4 track stamped & stenciled 7".
Gatefold goldprint insert.
BBR Postcard pack.
Envelope containing - 5 track download code, BBR Letter & BBR History Part 1 Insert, Temporary Knuckle Tattoos & SuR Confetti.

LIMITED TO 125 COPIES ONLY.

name: HORSE BEACH Limited Edition 7"
description:
BBR#5-
HORSE BEACH 4 Track 7"

Finally its here for your consumption!
4 tracks of pristine chiming guitar pop, brooding melodies, classic hooks & swagger from Manchester's finely dressed Horse Beach. 
If you heart still beats to the golden melodies of Sarah Records & the sound of mid 80s indie innocence then this beauty will not be leaving your Dansette.
Promise!

4 track numbered 7" ( 5 track download!).
Comes in one of either 2 full colour sleeves (Red or Blue).
Contains a double sided colour insert & envelope containing -
2 BBR Inserts.
Download Code ( most copies will contain 2 download codes..so use 'em!)
Small bag of seashells.
'Sensitive' Penguin print bag of horseshoe/horse confetti + personalised HB hearts.

Limited to only 125 numbered copies!
***ONLY 1 PER POP KID***

Tracklist -
1. Even.
2. Yesterdays.
3. Object.
4. Lesson Learnt.

(bonus download track - How Long Must I Wait?)

name: TEMPLE SONGS Limited Edition 7"
description:
**This release has now SOLD OUT here **

BBR#4.
TEMPLE SONGS 'ATONAL NOISE' 7".

Manchester's Temple Songs give us 8 nuggets of lo-fi  psych-Oh-Delic amphetamine pop...its The Beatles & Beach Boys on wizz...a joyous heart attack of noisy pop!
This 7" contains 8(!) tracks & comes with a 10 track download code!

Tracklist -
Luxury Lice
I Can't Look After You (demo)
Magick With A 'K'
I Just Saw Sonny
Someone Get Her Outta Here
Sunspot Dandyline
I Could Kill You Anytime + a 14 second track!

You get-
Numbered sleeve with postcard attached to the front
Stampled & Stencilled 8 Track 7".
Doublesided gatefold insert.

Envelope containing-
Personalised Confetti.
Temple Songs Sticker Pack.
BBR Inserts & extras.
10 Track download code.

Limited to 100 copies.

name: TAPE WAVES Ltd Edition 4 track 7"
description:
BBR#3 TAPE WAVES

4 track stamped/stenciled 33rpm 7" of sunblushed woozy C86 styled dream pop to melt any heart!

Each 7" contains a double sided insert and envelope containing BBR inserts, download code, shabby chic confetti, Colour-By-Numbers postcard & mini scented notepad making the whole bundle smell summery.
Looks like summer, sounds like summer, smells like summer !

Tracklist-
1. Drifting.
2. Ready Now.
3. wherever I Go.
4. Somewhere.

Limited to 100 copies ONLY.

This item is now SOLD OUT here...

name: WATER WORLD 'Dead' Limited Edition 7"
description:
Water World's debut vinyl release!

This is the regular 'White Edition' (No extras) of the debut 7" & debut release on Box Bedroom Rebels.
I have a few back in stock.

Contains-
5 track hand stamped & stencilled 7".
Numbered sleeve (Ltd to 99 copies)
Insert.
Envelope containing BBR letters.

Includes 1 unreleased track ('Wakeboarding') & an alternative longer version of 'Cream Soda'.

Track Listing-
1. Dead.
2. Ultimate Party Time.
3. Make It Up.
4. Cream Soda (alt. longer version).
5. Wakeboarding (unreleased).


'Great scuzzy and fuzzy sounds from our fair city on a new local label showing tantalizing potential. Future collectors item? You bet!' - Piccadilly Records, Mrc.

'The trio play some laid back ‘90s-influenced slacker indie which is reminding me of Real Estate, Pavement and Triptides, quite simple and melodic songs with a casual, warm delivery. They’ve got a slightly thinner and less reverby sound to them which gives them a bit of a New Zealandy jangliness that fans of bands like The Clean will appreciate. When they do use fuzz, particularly on closer ‘Wakeboarding’, it’s really chunky and dirty like Urusei Yatsura. I like that. Cool EP, seems like a bit of a shame they’ve made so few of them' - Norman Records, Leeds.
